subject: Basketball
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: Alex Meruelo vowed Monday to do everything he could to bring an N.B.A. championship to Atlanta if his agreement to purchase a majority share of the Hawks is approved by the league.
snippet: Alex Meruelo vowed Monday to do everything he could to bring an N.B.A. championship to Atlanta if his agreement to purchase a majority share of the Hawks is approved by the league.
